elements.text:
*Event Management module*

Event: `EVT202209252000_0000`

Source: `AIOps`

Occurrence date and time: `2021-09-25 20:00 UTC`

Demonstration mode `enabled`, no service has been harmed.

*Description:* 

Storage device `KYNDRYL900_UK` is not responding under the configured limits causing impact to several services including `DB2` and `www.acme.com` web site.

*Business Impact:*

`www.acme.com` web site is unavailble for the ACME users causing revenue loss as it holds ACME main sales venue.

*HIGH IMPACT*

*Recommended Actions:* 

Based on previous similar incidents, `AIOps` recommends run a full soft recycle on the `KYNDRYL900_UK` storage device and verify all fiber ports. Then restart `DB2` instances.

*Additional Data:* 

See the thread for more information with graphics, topology, raw data from the monitoring and configuration item management systems.
